node.title: Purpose of branches in Git
node.description: In this post, I'm going to share some experience on how to use branches in Git, best practices, on how to delete them, and also restore them

node.title: Digest of interesting stuff #1
node.description: Hey, wanna share interesting things I had discovered these days.

node.title: Hello There
node.description: Hello there! Can you actually hear me ? It's the first post of mine.
